title: How to Buy a Cheap Used Tractor

tasks.task: Evaluate a used tractor for agricultural purposes.
subtasks: Check tire wear and fluid leaks.
Test steering responsiveness and power steering functionality.
Assess hydraulic system operation and potential leaks.
Verify power takeoff (PTO) functionality and compatibility.
Consider tractor's power and size relative to farm needs.

tasks.task: Determine the suitability of a tractor for specific acreage.
subtasks: Evaluate necessary tractor size for varying acreage ranges.
Assess the impact of different tractor components (e.g., PTO shaft, hydraulics) on implement compatibility.
Recommend appropriate tractors based on budget and features.
